Function# IORWUnlock

macOS 10.0+

```
void IORWUnlock(IORWLock *lock);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/1553027-iorwunlock#see-also)

### [Read/Write Locks](/documentation/kernel/1553027-iorwunlock#read/write-locks)

[`IORWLockAlloc`](/documentation/kernel/1553010-iorwlockalloc)Allocates and initializes a read/write lock.[`IORWLockFree`](/documentation/kernel/1553003-iorwlockfree)Frees a read/write lock.[`IORWLockGetMachLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553033-iorwlockgetmachlock)Accessor to a Mach read/write lock.[`IORWLockRead`](/documentation/kernel/1553004-iorwlockread)Lock a read/write lock for read.[`IORWLockUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1553011-iorwlockunlock)Unlock a read/write lock.[`IORWLockWrite`](/documentation/kernel/1552996-iorwlockwrite)Lock a read/write lock for write.[`IOWriteLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552985-iowritelock)[`IOReadLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553022-ioreadlock)
